entry.def: Wonderland is an imaginary world that exists in fairy stories.

entry.tran: 非常奇妙的地方;极美丽的地方
entry.def: You can refer to a place as a wonderland when it is strange and very beautiful or exciting.

example.ex: Children find Lake George Village a wonderland of amusement parks.
example.tran: 孩子们觉得乔治湖村是个绝妙的游乐园。

means.word_mean: 1. a place or scene of great or strange beauty or wonder
2. an imaginary realm of marvels or wonders

auth_sentence.content: This is a botanical wonderland not a waste ground.
